name: memory_category
description: Category of memory (survival, protocol, market, strategy, decision)

name: experience_type
description: Type of experience that created the memory

name: importance_score
description: Importance score of the memory (0.0 to 1.0)

name: emotional_state
description: Agent emotional state when memory was formed

name: market_condition
description: Market condition when memory was formed

name: treasury_balance
description: Treasury balance when memory was formed

name: key_concepts
description: Key concepts extracted from the experience

name: retrieval_count
description: Number of times this memory has been retrieved

name: last_accessed
description: When this memory was last accessed

name: mem0_memory_id
description: Corresponding memory ID in Mem0 system
